Hong Kong Supermarket

Your one-stop shop for authentic Asian groceries, produce, and hard-to-find ingredients.

Located in Winterville, North Carolina. Open Sunday - Wednesday 10 AM to 7 PM & Friday - Saturday 10 AM to 8 PM. Closed Thursday.

Visit Us
